title: Putin accuses Ukraine of 'terrorism' on Crimea bridge
description: The Russian president blames Ukrainian intelligence for Saturday's explosion. Also: Iranian students lead anti-government protests over the death of Mahsa Amini, and we hear from the grandfather of the three-year-old who survived Thursday’s massacre at a Thai nursery.
itunes:subtitle: The Russian president blames Ukrainian intelligence for Saturday's explosion
itunes:summary: The Russian president blames Ukrainian intelligence for Saturday's explosion. Also: Iranian students lead anti-government protests over the death of Mahsa Amini, and we hear from the grandfather of the three-year-old who survived Thursday’s massacre at a Thai nursery.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
